---
layout: post
title: "Go 微服务十五 生成雪花ID"
date: 2022-03-23
tags: [Go]
comments: true
author: mazezen
---


此文章基于自己的包实现

## 安装

```shell
go get github.com/jeffcail/jsnowflake 
```



## 使用

Demo

```go
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"github.com/jeffcail/jsnowflake"
)

func main() {
	m, err := jsnowflake.NewMachine(1)  // 机器ID
	if err != nil {
		panic(err)
	}

	for i := 0; i < 100; i++ {
		id := m.GenerateId()
		fmt.Println(id)
	}
}

```



结果:
